programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1842
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1050
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung is a fearless fighter who aligns himself with one of the two gang leaders ruling Guangzhou. However, there is more to the young Wong Fei Hung than meets the eye as he has a more dangerous agenda in mind.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the worlds best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the worlds top detective Q got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Grandmaster, The
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition to live the American dream.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the others parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Wandering Swordsman
programme.desc: The wandering swordsman Yu Hsieh Erh has formidable sword skills and helps the poor by robbing from thieves and distributing the wealth. He meets a group of bandits who are planning to rob a convoy escorting some valuables and is tricked into participating in the robbery. Yu soon realizes his folly and returns to take revenge on the bandits.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Vengeful Beauty
programme.desc: The Flying Guillotine assassins are secretly working for the Emperor and its leader Jin is sent to kill Hon, who knows this secret. Hons pregnant wife Rong seeks to kill Jin but retreats to protect her unborn child. When she is hunted down herself, Rong hooks up with a former Flying Guillotine member and her martial arts senior to fight back...

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their death. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques. The Five Venom alumnus and Chang Cheh discovery, Lo Meng, teams up with Liu Chia-liang protege Wang Yu, as they inadvertently turn from vagabond kung-fu school operators into anti-Ching, patriotic fighters.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: The venerated Sun Chung made many different kinds of films for Shaw Brothers, including popular and renowned satirical comedies, contemporary action dramas, and magnificent martial arts movies. This is one of his last of the latter for the studio, so he wanted to have fun... and let the audience share it. Toward that end he cast international favorite Alexander Fu Sheng as the title character who keeps testing the patience (and kung-fu skills) of his father, a small town bonesetter and herbal healer played by award-winning character actor Ku Feng. But when a local dignitary not only smuggles drugs but plans to give a Chinese treasure away to evil outsiders, the father and son unite to take on foreign fighters and even Japanese ninja in a non-stop display of comic action prowess.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.desc: An attractive older guest at the Lake Como Resort has her eye on a handsome, well-to-do bachelor, and will go to outrageous lengths to reel in her wealthy catch.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: Jack Black stars as a hell-raising guitarist with delusions of grandeur. Kicked out of his band, he impersonates a substitute teacher and turns a class of fifth graders into high-voltage rock and rollers.

programme.title: Blockbusters S1
programme.desc: Emma vs Eddie and Alex - Dara Briain schools our sixth former contestants Emma, Eddy, and Alex as they take on this iconic trivia-based quiz for the chance to win some epic prizes! No phones allowed.

programme.title: Herstory: Judge Judy S23 Ep65
programme.desc: A woman is admitted to the hospital after allegedly witnessing her mother-in-law being attacked by their tax preparer's dogs. A man loses part of his finger while helping his boss move a concrete grinder.

programme.title: Herstory: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Drew has a big surprise in store for Deloris 'NuNu' and Patrick 'PopPop' Hogan who run a safe and reliable 24-hour daycare to help the parents in their community.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Disappearance - Harold Heaven disappeared from his cabin in Minden, Ontario in October 1934. Harold's great-great nephew Mike and Mike's best friend Jackson Rowe are determined to solve this coldest of cold cases.

programme.title: The Good Wife S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Mock - Peter finds himself in danger of going back to jail after he chases Alicia out of the apartment, thereby breaking his house arrest, and causing his monitor to go off.

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

programme.title: Star Trek: Short Treks S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Trouble with Edward - Newly minted Captain Lynne Lucero is excited to take command of the U.S.S.Cabot, until she meets Edward Larkin, an ornery scientist who believes he has found a revolutionary new use for tribbles.

programme.title: Blockbusters S1

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Two unlikely prospective lifeguards vie for jobs alongside the buff bodies who patrol a beach in California.

programme.title: Most Ridiculous S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Crazy Kids - The show with the best clips anywhere on the web and this time it's Crazy Kids getting the Most Ridiculous treatment. Stupid schoolkids, playtime pratfalls and terrible teenagers.

programme.title: Herstory: Judge Judy S23 Ep65
programme.desc: A woman is admitted to the hospital after allegedly witnessing her mother-in-law being attacked by their tax preparer's dogs. A man loses part of his finger while helping his boss move a concrete grinder.

programme.title: Herstory: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep67
programme.desc: Drew has a big surprise in store for Deloris 'NuNu' and Patrick 'PopPop' Hogan who run a safe and reliable 24-hour daycare to help the parents in their community.

programme.title: The Night We Never Met
programme.desc: Brian doesn't want to give up his bachelor pad so he decides to share his small apartment with Ellen and Sam. The living arragenement works out well until Brian and Sam swap nights without telling Ellen.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Neighbor - The trail leads Mike and Jackson to uncover another suspect - a neighbor who disputed with Harold Heaven over a parcel of land. Suspicions arise over a landmark on the Heaven property known as 'The Bump'.

programme.title: The Good Wife S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Mock - Peter finds himself in danger of going back to jail after he chases Alicia out of the apartment, thereby breaking his house arrest, and causing his monitor to go off.

programme.title: World Trade Center
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in the unforgettable true story of the courageous rescue and survival of two Port Authority policemen who were trapped in the rubble on September 11, 2001.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Decisions In Athens
programme.desc: Inspector Mehmet goes on an unofficial assignment abroad to help his ex-wife Sevim to track down her missing partner Steffen, an investigative journalist, and his kidnapped daughter Clara in the Greek capital Athens.

programme.title: Out Of Paradise
programme.desc: Dorj and Surens idyllic nomadic life on the Mongolian Steppe is shaken as Suren develops complications in her pregnancy. They embark on a heartwarming journey to the capital, Ulaanbaatar, to seek medical treatment, and overcome challenges along the way.

programme.title: Far Frontiers
programme.desc: Maria, wife of a deputy commander of a Russian military base in Kyrgyzstan, begins a relationship with another officer. Their affair quickly spirals out of control, fatally and irreversibly changing the course of Maria's and her family's life.

programme.title: Cookbook Of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics not least, bribing a TV chef to steal her heart through cooking.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: Ms Busche
programme.desc: After her son leaves for college, Katrin, a single mother, finds love again. However, her happiness is fleeting as challenges implode in her life. Her father has an accident, her ex-husband tries to repossess the house and her son unexpectedly returns home.

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: Saul Indian Horse is an indigenous man who was forcefully removed from his family when he was a young boy. Placed in a strict boarding school, he struggles to find peace with his life. He eventually finds salvation in the unlikeliest of places hockey.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: The film tells the stories of different people and how they are intertwined surrounding the gruesome death of a man who got thrown out of a window.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isnt allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: 7 Hours To Win Your Heart
programme.desc: When Giulios fiance cheats on him right before their wedding, the newly singled Giulio decides to attend classes to win back his fiance taught by Valeria, a beautiful and determined relationship coach disillusioned with love.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.desc: Don't touch that remote, it's time for 20 of the World's Dumbest TV Shows... from Brazilian cross dressers and out-of-control bounty hunters, to a reverend who curses up a storm, insane mixed martial arts, and the cheesiest superhero ever to pretendto fly. With hilarious commentary from comedians like Jared Logan, Judy Gold, and Chris Fairbanks.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Murr, Sal, Q, and Joe share secrets with shoppers in a grocery store, but when one shopper has a history with Murr the embarrassment escalates to a whole new level! And tonight's big loser heads to the airport with a travel itinerary that would make anyone nauseous.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 1

Act now and we'll throw in our one of a kind cast, includingTodd Bridges, Jaimie Andrews, Brendon Walsh and John Enos.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 2
programme.desc: Gentlemen, start your engines! We've got a motorcade of 20 of the dumbest drivers to ever turn an ignition. programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers
programme.desc: Filmmaking legends Steven Spielberg and Clint Eastwood team up for the first time to tell the unforgettable story of the grueling World War II battle for the island of Iwo Jima -- a turning point in the war for control over the Pacific. The battle produced one of the war's most enduring images: a photograph of six U.S. Marines raising an American flag on the top of Mt. Suribachi. Multiple Academy Award winner Eastwood directs a powerful all-star ensemble including Paul Walker, Ryan Phillippe, Adam Beach, Jamie Bell, Barry Pepper, Neal McDonough and more in this tragic depiction of an epic struggle that would cost the lives of thousands of Japanese and American soldiers.

programme.desc: Killer Regrets - Horatio protects a Mexican police chief from the mysterious assassin who killed her husband.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire used to be a successful sports agent who is fired when he develops an honorable streak. To his dismay, he finds he has also lost most of his clients and his fiance.

programme.title: Little House On The Prairie S9 Ep1
programme.desc: Little House: The Last Farewell - The town of Walnut Grove is revealed to have been built on land owned by a railroad tycoon. The citizens deal with the loss of their town and lifestyles, and some must decide how best to respond to this event.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep01
programme.desc: That's Show Biz - Part 1 - Instant rapport develops between personnel of a U.S.O. troupe and the M*A*S*H unit when the entertainers must make an unscheduled stop at the 4077th; one of their singers needs an emergency appendectomy. Marina falls in love with Hawkeye, who saved her life by performing her operation, while Potter finds an immediate mutual fondness with Brandy, a burlesque performer that Potter remembers spinning her tassels in a Kansas City hall years ago. When the roads leaving camp are closed due to nearby gunfire everyone is glad to spend more time with the performers. Klinger and Fast Freddie, the comic, while away the days throwing horrible one-liners back and forth, and Charles finds himself increasingly attracted to a female musician. Father Mulcahy busies himself searching for singer Sarahs GI brother and then has the sad duty of telling her he was killed in action. The U.S.O. unit thanks the 4077th for their hospitality by staging a show for their new friends and all are feeling bittersweet when the troupe must again be on its way, entertaining more soldiers in need.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Jenny's Low - Jenny gives her brother an ice-cold reception when he suddenly appears after a two-year absence. George is the only one who understands Jenny's strange behavior but he makes no bones about saying so.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep08
programme.desc: Love Thy Neighbor - Norm is forced to stop joking and take a serious look at his marriage when a female neighbor informs him that his wife, Vera, and her husband are having an affair.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep13
programme.desc: House Call - Glen returns to Paige's life with a big surprise - he is about to get married. Meanwhile, the sisters summon a Witch Doctor whom they want to dispatch all the evil remnants that surround the Manor.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep01
programme.desc: Bumpy Road To Love - Adam the hermit's hypochondriac wife (Valerie Mahaffey) holds Joel hostage; Maggie goes on a drinking binge after learning her deceased boyfriend Rick was unfaithful.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep02
programme.desc: Only You - Joel searches for the chemical that makes Chris irresistible to women; Maggie learns she needs glasses; Chris experiences unrequited love.

When the roads leaving camp are closed due to nearby gunfire everyone is glad to spend more time with the performers. Klinger and Fast Freddie, the comic, while away the days throwing horrible one-liners back and forth, and Charles finds himself increasingly attracted to a female musician. Father Mulcahy busies himself searching for singer Sarahs GI brother and then has the sad duty of telling her he was killed in action. The U.S.O. unit thanks the 4077th for their hospitality by staging a show for their new friends and all are feeling bittersweet when the troupe must again be on its way, entertaining more soldiers in need.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep01
programme.desc: A Dinner For Harry - It is Harry's birthday, and the Jeffersons have invited him and the Willises over for a dinner party. But the occasion turns sour when Tom shows up wearing the same tuxedo as George, causing George to become jealous.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep09
programme.desc: From Beer To Eternity - The Cheers gang challenges the regulars from a rival bar to a bowling tournament to avenge their losses in other sporting events. When another defeat seems on the way, they produce an unexpected ace.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep14
programme.desc: Sand Francisco Dreamin' - A demon attacks The Charmed Ones with dream dust, causing their nightmares to come to life. Paige is harassed by an evil clown, Piper has an affair and Phoebe is chased by a maniac with a chainsaw.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Oy Wilderness - When engine trouble forces Maggie's plane down, she and Joel are stranded deep in the Alaskan wilderness.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Animals R US - Maggie finally settles unresolved issues with her late boyfriend Rick when she encounters a stray dog that she believes is his reincarnation.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep03
programme.desc: Identity Crisis - The 4077th has more than medical problems to handle when three G.I.s come to the unit for care. First they discover that Gerald Mullen has switched dog tags with a buddy who was killed two weeks before he was to be discharged in order to get himself out of the war. Then another post-op patient causes trouble by refusing to stay in bed because he is constantly trying to sell mutual funds for his company back home. The third patient needs help from the staff in answering a Dear John" letter he has received from his girl back home.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S10 Ep04
programme.desc: Rumor at the Top - Major Burnham is sent to the 4077th. Everyone at the M*A*S*H unit fears that the Logistics and Support department has sent him because they want to dismantle the unit, sending members of the best unit out to reseed a new M*A*S*H unit. The group decides to underplay their efficiency and to pretend to be as unreliable and incompetent as possible. When a shipment of wounded soldiers arrives, however, the 4077th cant help but return to its true form as the best medical unit in the Army. Everyone is of course relieved to find that Major Burnham was merely sent to observe the best unit, not to break it up.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Meet the Classically-Trained Competition - Six classically-trained baking duos search their kitchens for clues, which leads to several victories and one elimination.

programme.desc: A squad of Ohio taco artists is determined to win an annual food truck competition.

programme.desc: Weather - Weather controls the distribution of freshwater around our planet. In turn, shapes the lives of animals across the globe, rising to an incredible diversity of species and habitats.

programme.desc: Madagascar - Joanna continues along the Spice Trail to Madagascar.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mamma Etna - Mount Etna, Europe's most active volcano, is experiencing its longest spate of eruptions in recent years. Our story starts almost a year earlier, long before the eruptions reach full force. Etna fires off intermittently and, on the summit, a new volcanic crater grows.

programme.desc: Bloodlines - Chip and Carol Hailstone combat brutal conditions on a critical hunt to replenish the family's food supply. Sue Aikens utilizes her time in Chena to upkeep and maintain the property's structures.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep9
programme.desc: Polo Mints - Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. They have been churning out these little holey wonders since 1948.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hong Kong - Michael begins his adventures in Hong Kong, with railway highlights including the cable funicular to the top of Hong Kong's highest mountain, the Peak, and the enviably efficient and shiny Mass Transit System.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chiang Mai to the River Kwai - Michael Portillo embarks on a two-part adventure through Thailand. Michael helps out at an elephant hospital, tries his hand at the art of umbrella-making and learns about northern Thai cuisine.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bangkok to Hua Hin - Michael continues his exploration of Thailand by rail, steered by his 1913 Bradshaw's guide. First, he steps into the ring under the guidance of champion trainer, Master Toddy, to learn Muay Thai boxing. Can he perfect the Cobra inspired right hook?

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ho Chi Minh to Hoi An - Michael Portillo boards Vietnam's spectacular Reunification Railway to make a 1,000-mile journey from Ho Chi Minh City to Hanoi. He visits the container port of Haiphong and finishes in Halong Bay.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hue to Halong Bay - Michael Portillo travels through the Socialist Republic of Vietnam. Near the formidable imperial city of Hue, Michael meets milliner Mrs Ngo, who teaches him how to make the iconic conical hat.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Jakarta to Borobudur - In the heaving megacity of Jakarta, Michael Portillo uncovers Indonesia's colonial past as part of a Dutch empire and its rich history as a port.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Yogyakarta to Surabaya - Beginning in Java's royal city, Yogyakarta, Michael Portillo visits the Sultan's Palace and witnesses the ancient art of shadow puppetry, known as wayang.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Penang to Cameron Highlands - Michael rides one of the steepest and fastest funicular railways in the world and steps into a tropical paradise as he releases exotic specimens at Malaysia's first butterfly sanctuary.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Singapore - Michael Portillo's railway tour reaches its final stop - Singapore. Michael walks the streets of Chinatown with a local artist and uncovers the history of the Chinese community there.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Spice Trail Adventure S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Madagascar - Joanna continues along the Spice Trail to Madagascar.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep23
programme.desc: A Las Vegas crew has just one night to finish a two-day job. Tackling several last-minute wedding cakes they've got no margin for error.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep24
programme.desc: A mega fish order form Harvard university means an early start for a crew of fishermen.

programme.title: Zoo Quest in Colour S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Part 2 - During the 1950s a young Sir David Attenborough and a team from London Zoo worked to conserve rare and exotic animals by bringing them to the UK. Part 2/2.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Niceness - Griff Rhys Jones begins his exploration of Ontario at Niagara Falls, right on the U.S border, to uncover what it is that makes Canadians so nice.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep25
programme.desc: A Louisiana fishing boat faces mechanical breakdowns and a Toronto catering company struggles to prepare thousands of meals for travellers.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep26
programme.desc: Bakers make 440 birthday cakes for a celebration at the U.S. Air Force Academy in Colorado Springs; an overnight crew prepares 250 gourmet meals for train passengers.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Borneo - A journey from Borneo's rich coral reefs, through lush jungles to its mountainous heart, revealing why this island is home to a greater variety of life than almost any other.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Stewart Island - Marine Biologist Jacky Geurts infiltrates the murky world of the little known seven gill shark, and investigates the story of the mysterious Japanese tourist who lived in a cave. Maritime Archaeologist Matt Carter delves into a brief encounter that left a curious legacy on the island.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Hurricane Michael hits Florida, a group of fishermen capsize in rough seas and a police officer is hurt by a car careering out of control in the snow.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S8 Ep10
programme.desc: The Big Catch - Ricko DeWilde teaches his children to survive in the wild as they journey to Huslia. Sue Aikens updates her camp to improve her comfort.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Balancing the Forest - Survival in the forest means maintaining a delicate balance between growth and destruction and death and rebirth - a forest should be in a constant state of regeneration. When trees get too tall they block all the sunlight from hitting the ground, which means grasses and smaller shrubs cant grow, diminishing habitat for animals like elk, moose, caribou, and wolves.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Vietnam: Life in the Delta - The final country on the Mekongs journey is the home of the rivers mighty delta. A large deposit of rich nutrients carried downstream from hundreds of kilometres makes this region, the jewel of Vietnams crown, a biological treasure trove.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tides - Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Wild Rockies 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Waterways - Some of mightiest rivers in North America originate on the glacial heights of the Rocky Mountains. The lakes, rivers and marshes of the Rockies are like arteries pulsing through the landscape, feeding the creatures that call the mountains home. Fed by glaciers and motivated by gravity, these waterways are split by the massive Rockies, which divert flow into the Atlantic, Pacific, and Arctic Oceans. From the uninhabitable icy pecks, water melts off glaciers, runs down thunderous waterfalls, filters through wetlands, sculpts the terrain, and finally flows out to the ocean, sustaining life and transforming environments along the way.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep6
programme.desc: City - Its Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifaxs raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Highlands - Cape Breton Highlands National Park was established to protect the primeval forest from clear-cutting but today the park faces a new threat. Moose, beavers and moths have combined to decimate large sections of the Boreal and Acadian woodlands

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. From giant carnivorous centipedes and nocturnal crickets to fishing spiders and glowing worms with silken traps. Weird and wonderful, these unsung heroes are Wildest New Zealands Creepiest Crawlies.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Save the Giants - The wild coastline of Mozambique stretches along more than 1,600 miles - an area teeming with a diversity of marine life. Some of the worlds largest filter feeders are attracted to this nutrient-rich water. But even these large creatures are defenceless against reckless overfishing. Two of Mozambiques leading marine researchers, Andrea Marshall and Nakia Cullain, set out to find one of the oceans most secretive animals and protect its most well known, before its too late.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain - Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: iSimangoliso - In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 Ep2

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Wetlands - Wild Wild Easts wetland habitats are at risk. These marshes and bogs are the ancient home of the endangered Blandings Turtle. But each fall new turtles spring from the lake shores of Nova Scotia. If the vulnerable Blandings can make it through their first few years of life, they'll live for almost a century. But saving the turtle means protecting the wetlands, and all the other amphibians and reptiles that call the slow-moving waters home.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Clean Up Crew - Every day a struggle for survival plays out across Africa. Predators binge on the dead and natures undertakers circle above waiting for their chance. When the mighty fall, an army descends to devour what others leave behind for they too must nurture their precious families.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Turtle Beach - Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Macro Mozambique - The coast of Mozambique is home to giants, like humpbacks and whale sharks, but the tiniest species play just as big of a role in the ecosystem. Meet the scientists who are working against the clock to protect coastal creatures big and small.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Kingdom of the Tide - Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: The Ocean's Greatest Feast
programme.desc: The Ocean's Greatest Feast - Get a front-row seat to the planets biggest biomass migration, the annual 1,000-mile sardine run along South Africas east coast. See billions of these tiny fish run a gauntlet of hungry predators, including stealthy seals and dive-bombing gannets.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep45
programme.desc: See You Next Pluesday / The Doppelganger - After learning Murph is moving away, Archibald wishes for one last day to spend with her. But when the wish magically comes true, Archibald is forced to relive the same day over and over again. / Archibald meets his doppelganger and enjoys all the fun that comes with having a twin. But when the doppelganger threatens to become a permanent fixture in the Strutter house, Archibald must prove he is the real deal.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep72
programme.desc: Grandpa's Treasures - In the wake of her grandfather's death, Lucky sets out to show the town his softer side and give him the goodbye he deserves.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep43
programme.desc: The Dread Pirate Richie / Crush 4U Where RU? - A tech-obsessed Richie struggles to stick to the pirate code. Richie surprises the girls with a robotic boy band -- modeled after Crush 4U!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep7
programme.desc: Pet Project / Mission Improbable - When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sams behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into mans best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, its up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Marias painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep45
programme.desc: See You Next Pluesday / The Doppelganger - After learning Murph is moving away, Archibald wishes for one last day to spend with her. But when the wish magically comes true, Archibald is forced to relive the same day over and over again. / Archibald meets his doppelganger and enjoys all the fun that comes with having a twin. But when the doppelganger threatens to become a permanent fixture in the Strutter house, Archibald must prove he is the real deal.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep90
programme.desc: Flowertot Taxi - Stingo is sure he is on to a good thing when he decides to start up a taxi service using slug power! Slugsy is soon exhausted and unable to keep up with the demand

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep91
programme.desc: Fifi's Happy Day - Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep92
programme.desc: Fly High Primrose - Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep93
programme.desc: Lovelorn Slugsy - Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What's The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep27
programme.desc: What Do We Need To Grow Beans? - Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep28
programme.desc: Why Is Hedgehog Curled Up? - Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Olivia Ep33
programme.desc: Olivia Explores The Attic - Olivia searches high and low for Grandma's missing time capsule, and eventually finds it tucked away, forgotten, in the attic. Olivia is puzzled and thrilled by the objects that she finds from Grandmother's childhood, and is inspired to create her own time capsule.

programme.title: Olivia Ep34
programme.desc: Olivia's Good Luck - Olivia is determined to sell more Young Pioneers cookies than anybody else in her troupe especially Francine. It turns out to be harder than she thought it would be, but with a little perseverance and ingenuity, Olivia manages to do her personal best.

programme.title: Olivia Ep35
programme.desc: Olivia Runs A Carnival - When Mrs. Hogenmuller's class plans a Parents' Night, Olivia thrills her classmates when she suggests the idea of a carnival. In her own special way Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements, and when the night of the carnival arrives, she still has a few surprises up her sleeve.

programme.title: Olivia Ep36
programme.desc: Olivia Makes Magic - After seeing Grandma perform an impromptu magic show, Olivia begins practicing her own magic tricks. She doesn't have much success, until she manages to make herself disappear for Ian and Julian. They can't figure out how she's done it, but Ian doesn't care. He just wants his big sister back!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep25
programme.desc: Why Flamingo Stands On One Leg - You see there was a time when Flamingo stood on both legs. One morning, Flamingo and her flock landed at the Water Hole when all the crabs were busy performing their underwater dance. Needless to say, all these legs where in their way! Tortoise came up with the plan that if all Crabs each nipped a flamingo leg, there will be room to share the waterhole. So from then on, Flamingo stood on one legs and Crabs were able to perform their dance in the watering hole

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep26
programme.desc: Why Woodpecker Pecks - You see there was a time when Woodpecker didn't peck. All the birds had their very own sound, but Woodpecker didn't make a sound at all. Then one very dark night in Tinga Tinga, the Moon and the Stars disappear! The animals summon the birds to tell Lion but Woodpecker can't pass the message on! Distraught, Woodpecker flies up to the skies but where are the stars?! And where is the Moon?! In desperation Woodpecker pecks at the dark sky and a star comes back, then another, then another! Everyone is delighted, no beast more than Woodpecker who now has her very own special sound pecking.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep27
programme.desc: Why Ostrich Sticks Her Head In The Ground - You see there was a time when Ostrich was all covered in feathers and unlike all the other birds, Ostrich wasn't very good at flying at all. One night in Tinga Tinga Spider decided to make Jackal a pair of wings so that he could fly up to the moon and stop howling! Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her. And it was perfect because Ostrich looked just like a bush! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep28
programme.desc: Why Camel Has A Hump - You see there was time when Camel didn't have a hump. He lived very far away in the hot desert. But one day the desert got too hot even for Camel. So he started walking. When Camel arrived at the Waterhole he asked the animals if he good have a drink. All the animals weren't pleased at all because the rains hadn't come and they were very thirsty. Lion allowed Camel to have one drink but ONE drink, and ONE DRINK ONLY! Camel slurped, and he slurped, and he slurped! Until POP!' a big, wobbly hump appeared on his back full of all the animals' water! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep18
programme.desc: Coop, Where's My Guy? / Fluffleberry Quest - When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branch's favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep70
programme.desc: Squad Goals - When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep73
programme.desc: There Will Be Mud - Big Oil is bringing big improvements to the school. But new track stables, an upgraded veterinary lab and dorm rooms come at a cost and spark disaster.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep8
programme.desc: An Inconvenient Tooth / Up, Up and Away - After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lulas pillow in time for the Tooth Fairys visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !

programme.desc: Swine And Roses - It's Lord Crispintine's Day, and Toby is set on Cleevil as his Crispintine, but after a gang of imps from the portal teach Toby to be a real bad boy, he learns of their true plans

programme.desc: The Wings Of War Part 1 - Hiccup and the riders are on the run from the Flyers, but when they return to Berk, where Stoick is preparing for war, Hiccup is torn between his desire to get the Edge back and his unwillingness to fire on dragons

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep94
programme.desc: Fifi's Snowy Fun - It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep95
programme.desc: Mystery In Flowertot Garden - Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep96
programme.desc: Stingo Cleans Up - Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep97
programme.desc: My Fair Bumble - Bumble has been asked to Aunt Tulip's for tea but he is worried that his manners are not up to scratch. He asks the other tots to help him out.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep29
programme.desc: How Can We Make The Most Beautiful Garden Ever? - Poor Mimi! Her normally beautiful garden is all messy and full of swirly piles of earth. She's really upset and Jess promises to her help her make it the most beautiful garden ever! Raking away the swirls doesn't work, they just come back! Jess and Mimi realise that worms are making the swirly piles of earth. Mimi wants to move them away but they go back underground before she can catch them. When it rains the worms come back and Jess and Mimi gather up the worms in a bucket and take them to live in the orchard by a patch of scrappy flowers. The garden still isn't looking at it's best though! After the worms have gone Mimi's flowers go all droopy. Willow explains that worms make help make the soil rich and good for plants and that's what makes the flowers bloom. Jess remembers that the worms had come out when it rained. They water the ground to bring the worms up to the surface again. The worms agree to come back to Mimi's garden and soon her garden is beautiful again. Yippety Yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep30
programme.desc: Why Are There Little Hills In The Orchard? - Jess and the pups have been looking after the orchard while Willow's been on holiday but the day she's due back the orchard is full of little piles of earth. What's making them? That's the Big Question. Jess wonders if someone put them there. He asks Mimi, who's making a pile of earth while she digs a hole. She tells him she's going to plant an apple tree. Maybe someone's been planting new apple trees in the orchard thinks Jess. But when he looks carefully there are no holes or newly planted trees. Horace the hoppy frog suggests that maybe it's an invisible digger who's digging underground. Billie the little mouse arrives and tells Jess that the little piles of earth are called molehills. Jess works out that the piles of earth are in a line. Maybe someone is digging a tunnel underground so they can travel right across the orchard. They keep very quiet and a tiny mole pops out above ground. That's who's been making piles of earth in the orchard. They've answered the question. Hooray!
